summary: Upset by rumors that Halloween may end, Dracula calls his mild-mannered monsters together and delivers an ultimatum - either regain their frightening image, or leave his Transylvania castle forever.
cast: Judd Hirsch|Mariette Hartley|Henry Gibson|Jack Riley|John Schuck|Robert Fitch|Josip Elic|Andrew Duncan|Jamie Ross|Maggie Peters Ross|Charles Fields|Kristin Williams
title: The Halloween That Almost Wasn't
